thread.title: Air Defense Forces Shot Down 62 Drones That Russia Used to Attack Ukraine
thread.title_full: Air Defense Forces Shot Down 62 Drones That Russia Used to Attack Ukraine

author: Ірина Вакулюк
title: Air Defense Forces Shot Down 62 Drones That Russia Used to Attack Ukraine
text:
Air Defense Forces Disarm 62 Drones Used by Russia to Attack Ukraine
Air defense forces have neutralized 62 of the 66 Russian drones that Russia used to attack Ukraine on the night of September 11.
This was reported by the Air Force command.
It is noted that on the night of September 11 (from 21:00 on September 10), the enemy attacked with 66 strike UAVs of the Shahed, Gerbera type and drones of other types in the following directions: Kursk, Millerovo, Primorsko-Akhtarsk – Russian Federation, more than 50 of them are Shaheds.
The air attack was repelled by anti-aircraft missile forces, electronic warfare units, unmanned systems, and mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces.
According to preliminary data, as of 09:00, air defense shot down/suppressed 62 enemy UAVs of the Shahed, Gerbera and other types of drones in the north, south and east of the country.
Hit by 4 attack UAVs was recorded at 3 locations.
Let us recall that according to the General Staff, 205 combat clashes have occurred on the Russian-Ukrainian front . The hottest situation remains in the Pokrovsky direction.
Also follow “Pryamy” on Facebook , Twitter , Telegram and Instagram.
topics: War, Conflict and Unrest->international military intervention
